parameters.name: end
parameters.description: ending unix timestamp or trade tx id of results (optional. inclusive)

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: starting unix timestamp or trade tx id of results (optional. exclusive)

parameters.name: trades
parameters.description: whether or not to include trades related to position in output (optional.     default = false)

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: ype = type of trade (optional) all = all types (default) any position = any     position (open or closed) closed position = positions that have been closed closing     position = any trade closing all or part of a position no position = non-positional trades
